content:
I recently started getting an exception from the IG Publisher:

not the right kind of structure to generate schematrons for

Attached is the log: c-cda-on-fhir-ig-publisher-build-20170711.txt

This does not seem to stop the ig publisher from finishing, but I'm not sure why I am getting this exception all of the sudden. I am using the same files that I used the other day, but only updated the ig publisher to the latest version from build.fhir.org?

@Grahame Grieve any idea why I am suddenly getting this error?
no. nothing has changed down there either
I added some context to the message.
but we have a problem - I'm about to drop out of circulation for a couple of weeks
If the additional context doesn't help Sean, let me know and I'll try to dig into it this weekend.
